about US

About us

Software development can be expensive, time-consuming, and risky.

We provide a unique, affordable and reliable end-to-end nearshore software development.

If what you are looking for your company is quality work, accuracy, cost-effective and speed, Kingdom Code is your best option. We provide top quality technology talent, guarantee cultural affinity, geographical proximity and time zone, reductions of cost, a high level of quality and the work is delivered over time stipulated.

We become your strategic partners, top notch outsourcing services with confidence.

We are a call away from you. Contact us today!

TECHNOLOGIES

TECHNOLOGIES

Application development in multiple technologies.

We usually work for application development companies, IT companies or technology companies and follows their technology of choice.

We are currently working in the technologies listed below. In case a specific technology is not available, our HR department recruits as per client specification.

Insoft also has partnerships with all major training institutions and Universities, where current staff are retrained if required on short notice by certified instructors.
